umbrellaSection.title: Do you know what the umbrella means for guides?
umbrellaSection.subtitle: A symbol of tradition, unity, and care for the visitor.
umbrellaSection.text1: In Foz do Iguaçu, the umbrella has become an icon. It is not just an item to protect against rain or strong sun.
umbrellaSection.text2: For guides, the colorful umbrella is a reference point, a sign that your guide is there, ready to lead and take care of you. It is a symbol of welcome and a link of connection amidst the crowd.
umbrellaSection.text3: It represents the union of our class and the care with which we receive each visitor, ensuring that no one gets lost and that everyone enjoys the experience to the fullest. A hug in the form of an umbrella!

guide.title: Guide for Your Group
guide.description:
The Tour Guide accompanies your company's excursion to the various local attractions, enriching the visits with information, facts and curiosities, science and culture, in addition to providing practicality and safety throughout the visit. They develop tour logistics, optimize schedules, routes, boarding/disembarking, etc;
*Reservation subject to availability.
guide.howItWorks:
You will request a date and schedule the Tour Guide for your service, and they will be at the requested location and time, ready to execute the itinerary, accompanying, informing, and guiding throughout the contracted tour(s).
Doubts, curiosities, stories, history, and science of the region and/or tourist attraction can be addressed during the professional's service.
Regional-PR TOUR GUIDE accredited by CADASTUR.
guide.howToBook:
We are working to offer an efficient online scheduling system to better serve you.
Currently, you can use the FORM to send your travel information and the WhatsApp button to ask questions.
Payment can be made via Pix (in full) or credit card with fees (via link)

private.title: Private Tours
private.description:
In this modality, you will hire a tour with private transport, a Tour Guide driving an accredited tourist vehicle, with differentiated access, exclusively for you and your family or friends.
Reservation subject to availability
private.howItWorks:
GTF bases its services on the concept of service through an Accredited Tour Guide (Cadastur) combined with transport service with an equally accredited vehicle, operating through prior appointment.
We will pick you up from your accommodation and take you to the tours you chose, and after completion, you will be returned to the hotel.
Rates will be applied, configuring a value for each selected attraction in the FORM regarding transport, making it possible to combine tours in sequence (itinerary) and optimize your time. (Tickets are not included but can be added to the service package).
Accredited Vehicle has inspection by competent bodies, identification logo, and Cadastur registration number (Registry of Tourist Service Providers); for your safety.
private.howToBook:
Just set up your itinerary and finalize the purchase via our WhatsApp, where an experienced guide will analyze and finalize your itinerary.
Payment for the contracted services can be made via Pix (in full) or credit card with fees (via link)
